name: Flared Skirt
description: It's back!  A feminine classic and one of our bestsellers, this practical yet beautiful skirt is now avaible in classic navy, or in a color of your choice upon request.  At 24 inches long with a side zipper, this skirt is also easy to wear and perfect for occasions from everyday to church to casual get-togethers.  The no-iron poly-cotton material washes and wears well making it easy to care for!  Available in longer lengths upon request.

name: Long Spiralled Skirt
description: New for fall and winter, this spiralled brown microsuede skirt is not only warm, practical, and modest but also beautiful!  With just enough flare for comfortable wear, this new classic is perfect for occasions from school to social gatherings to church.  A side zipper makes for easy wear.  Also available in dusty-plum microsuede (we'll send you a picture upon request) or in custom colors.  Shown in 32 inch length, this skirt is also available in 24 inch length upon request.

name: 8-Gored Denim Skirt
description:
One happy customer says of this skirt: I like my skirt, Susan!  The fabric has body, but it's not too hot for summer.

Made of a light and summery denim, this long skirt is both modest and great for spring and summer wear; in fact, it is among our bestsellers!  Made with plenty of flare to allow free movement, it is both practical and classy; nice enough to wear to church yet casual enough for everyday!  
Available with or without classic golden topstitching (topstitching shown). 
100% cotton 
Contour wiastband for optimum fit
Side zipper 
Available in all our lenghts and sizes!

For more cute items by Susan, visit www.cutethingsbysuzy.bigcartel.com

name: Ruffle Skirt
description:
Designed with a moderate amount of flare and edged with a delicate ruffle, this skirt is feminine in every detail.  The brown flowered sheer-weight fabric flows beautifully, and the lining keeps it modest.  Pair it with one of our matching scarves and our ruffle neck top for a morning at church or any nice occasion!  This skirt is also avalable in our brown or dusty plum moleskin.  Fabric options shown.

Easy-care - machine washable and dryable!  
A-line styling for just-right flare. 
Closes with a side zipper.
Skirt shown 24 inches long- jsut below knee length.  
Custom lengths available upon request!

Multiple fabric choices available!
Skirt shown in light-weight flowered poly. sheer with linng,
Chose from:  
Poly/Spandex moleskin in "Dusty Plum" or "Dark Brown"
Deep Purple corduroy

For more cute items by Susan, visit www.cutethingsbysuzy.bigcartel.com

name: Tan Twill skirt
description:
This durable skirt is crafted from our six-gored skirt pattern and 100% cotton twill-weave fabric for nice drape and excellent durabiltiy.  A year-round classic, this skirt is one you can walk in, work in, run in, and play in, all thanks to the sufficient amount of flare.  It is durable and goes with almost any top while adding color variety to your wardrobe.  The waistline is finished with a facing and the skirt has a side zipper- no elastic.  At 28" long it falls at mid calf.  Emily says, "this one's almost double Emily approved!"  Available in Denim upon request!

zips closed on left side; 28 inches long; other lengths available upon request; no pockets unless requested
Available in 100% Cotton Denim upon request!

For more cute items by Susan, visit www.cutethingsbysuzy.bigcartel.com
